pkgmetadata.longdescription: ============================Django IPG HRMS contract============================Quick start============1. Add 'contract' to your INSTALLED_APPS settings like this:: INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'contract' ]2. Include the contract to project URLS like this:: path('contract/', include('contract.urls')),3. Run ``python manage.py migrate`` to create contract model4. Another Apps Need for this Apps:: 4.1. custom:: 4.2. employee:: 4.3. user
